mapper.sql: drug_id, serial_num, generic_name, reagent_type, drug_size, company, transver_num, factory_name, product_name, tender_price, approval_num, approval_num_date, import_produc_status, package_material, drug_pack_comp, lr_price, retail_price_from, quality_level, quality_level_spec, test_report_status, drug_report_id, drug_report_id_date, drug_specification, drug_tranl_status, drug_type, drug_examine_status
mapper.select: select drug_id, serial_num, generic_name, reagent_type, drug_size, company, transver_num, factory_name, product_name, tender_price, approval_num, approval_num_date, import_produc_status, package_material, drug_pack_comp, lr_price, retail_price_from, ql.quality_level, quality_level_spec, test_report_status, drug_report_id, drug_report_id_date, drug_specification, ds.drug_tranl_status, drug_type, drug_examine_status from drug_info di left join quality_level ql on ql.id = di.quality_level left join drugtranl_status ds on ds.id = di.drug_tranl_status group by drug_id
mapper.insert: insert into drug_info (drug_id, serial_num, generic_name, reagent_type, drug_size, company, transver_num, factory_name, product_name, tender_price, approval_num, approval_num_date, import_produc_status, package_material, drug_pack_comp, lr_price, retail_price_from, quality_level, quality_level_spec, test_report_status, drug_report_id, drug_report_id_date, drug_specification, drug_tranl_status, drug_type, drug_examine_status ) values (#{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{genericName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reagentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transverNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{approvalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalNumDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{importProducStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packageMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugPackComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{retailPriceFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qualityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualityLevelSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testReportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drugReportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drugReportIdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drugSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugTranlStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drugType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugExamineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update drug_info
serial_num = #{serialNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
generic_name = #{genericName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reagent_type = #{reagentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_size = #{drugSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transver_num = #{transverNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
factory_name = #{factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tender_price = #{tenderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
approval_num = #{approvalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_num_date = #{approvalNumDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
import_produc_status = #{importProducStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
package_material = #{packageMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_pack_comp = #{drugPackComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lr_price = #{lrPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
retail_price_from = #{retailPriceFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quality_level = #{qualityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quality_level_spec = #{qualityLevelSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_report_status = #{testReportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
drug_report_id = #{drugReportId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
drug_report_id_date = #{drugReportIdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
drug_specification = #{drugSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_tranl_status = #{drugTranlStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
drug_type = #{drugType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drug_examine_status = #{drugExamineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update drug_info set serial_num = #{serialNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, generic_name = #{genericName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reagent_type = #{reagentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_size = #{drugSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transver_num = #{transverNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, factory_name = #{factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tender_price = #{tenderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, approval_num = #{approvalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_num_date = #{approvalNumDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, import_produc_status = #{importProducStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_material = #{packageMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_pack_comp = #{drugPackComp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lr_price = #{lrPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, retail_price_from = #{retailPriceFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quality_level = #{qualityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quality_level_spec = #{qualityLevelSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_report_status = #{testReportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drug_report_id = #{drugReportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drug_report_id_date = #{drugReportIdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, drug_specification = #{drugSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_tranl_status = #{drugTranlStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drug_type = #{drugType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_examine_status = #{drugExamineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
